TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit KeyVaultBackupClient extends System.Object

Docs.summary: The KeyVaultBackupClient provides synchronous and asynchronous methods to perform full and selective key backup and restore of the Azure Managed HSM.
